name: Don`t go Alone
description:
The player is looking for a treasure to be able to pay off his debts with a loan shark and one day he received at his house a cashier who promised to solve his problems inside it had a hat with a soul stuck in it the hat asked for help in exchange for the player could be a treasure forgotten for many years

Group TBA(Trabalhos Brabos Apenas):
  • Ighor - 2D|3D Artist and VFX Artist
  • Fabricio - Tech Artist and Programmer
  • Pedro - AI Programmer
  • Rafael - Multiplayer Programmer
  • Robson - Level Desing
Commands Movement W A S D
InteractionF
